Name: CONTACT OTHER PLANE
Description: Voumentally contact ademigod, the spirit ofalong.deadsage, or some other mysterious entity fram anotherplane. Contacting this extraplanar intelligence canstrain or even break your mind. When you cast thisspell, make a DC 15lntelligence saving thraw. On afailure, you take 6d6 psychic damage and are insaneuntil you finish a long rest. While insane, you can't takeactions, can't understand what other creatures say, can'tread, and speak only in gibberish, Agreater restorationspell cast on you ends this effect.On a successful save, you can ask the entity up to fivequestions, Vou must ask your questions before the spellends, The DM answers each question with one word,such as uyes," "no," "maybe," "never/' "irrelevant." ar"unclear" (if the entity doesn't know the answer to thequestion), ]f a one-word answer would be misleading,the DM might instead offer a short phrase as an answer,
